pageProduct.name: Sukin Natural Deodorant Ocean Mist 125ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Our Aluminium Free Deodorant Provides A Natural Option For Preventing Unwanted Odour. A Blend Of Aloe Vera, Burdock And Nettle Extracts Help To Cool And Soothe Skin, While Zinc Phenolsulfonate Helps To Prevent Bacteria Growth. We Combine Refreshing Natural Fragrances Of Marine Accord, Mint, Violet & Driftwood To Leave You Feeling Clean And Renewed.

Warnings

Avoid Contact With Eyes. If Irritation Occurs Rinse Immediately And Discontinue Use. For External Use Only.

Common Uses

Our Aluminium Free Deodorant Provides A Natural Option For Preventing Unwanted Odour.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Alcohol Denat., Zinc Phenolsulfonate, Ceteareth-20, Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Leaf Extract, Arctium Lappa Root Extract (Burdock), Equisetum Arvense Extract (Horsetail), Vanilla Planifolia Fruit Extract, Glycerin, Fragrance (Parfum)*, Citric Acid, Citral**, Citronellol**, Geraniol**, Linalool**, Limonene**.

* Natural Fragrance **Component Of Natural Fragrance

Directions

Spray Deodorant Onto Body And Under Arms When Required. Can Be Used As A Fabric Spray.
